Data using origianl Olink panel data, to separate these by plate number and PD and Contorl groups.  

Here I use Neurology panel as example

calculation of normalization (step2) was performed via python


```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df_N = read.csv(file.choose(), stringsAsFactors = F, sep=",",header=T,encoding="UTF-8")#import neurology panel
#head(df_N)

##plate separation 
p1 = df_N %>%
  filter_all(any_vars(grepl('GZY_neurology_1',.)))

p2 = df_N %>%
  filter_all(any_vars(grepl('GZY_neurology_plt2',.)))

##HC & PD
PD_p1 = p1 %>%
  filter_all(any_vars(grepl('PD',.)))
#head(PD_p1)

HC_p1 = p1 %>%
  filter_all(any_vars(grepl('Control',.)))
#head(HC_p1)

#write.table(PD_p1,"NU_PD1.csv",row.names=FALSE,col.names=TRUE,sep=",")
#write.table(HC_p1,"NU_HC1.csv",row.names=FALSE,col.names=TRUE,sep=",")

PD_p2 = p2 %>%
  filter_all(any_vars(grepl('PD',.)))
#head(PD_p2)

HC_p2 = p2 %>%
  filter_all(any_vars(grepl('Control',.)))
#head(HC_p2)

#write.table(PD_p2,"NU_PD2.csv",row.names=FALSE,col.names=TRUE,sep=",")
#write.table(HC_p2,"NU_HC2.csv",row.names=FALSE,col.names=TRUE,sep=",")

```

after separation, the rownames were missing, then added manually in excel (incl. Groups, ID, Plate, Assay)
